data.title: How to Watch BYU Basketball at Iowa State
data.meta_description: For the first time, BYU basketball is two games above .500 in conference play at 9-7. BYU swept a pair of critical games against Kansas and TCU last week. The
data.meta_site_name: BYU Cougars on Sports Illustrated: News, Analysis, and More
data.text:
For the first time, BYU basketball is two games above .500 in conference play at 9-7. BYU swept a pair of critical games against Kansas and TCU last week. The Cougars hit the road for a ranked matchup against no. 6 Iowa State. The game will be broadcast on the ESPN2. Below is all the information you need to watch, listen, or stream the game.

How to Watch BYU Basketball at Iowa State

Date: Wednesday, March 6

Time: 7:00 PM MT

TV Channel: ESPN2

Live Stream: fuboTV (Start your free trial)

Listen: BYU Radio | KSL Radio 102.7 FM/1160 AM

Game Information

BYU (21-8) vs Iowa State (23-6)

Wednesday, March 6

Tipoff: 7:00 p.m. MT

Ames, Iowa

James H. Hilton Coliseum

BYU in the Polls

On Monday, the new AP poll for college basketball was released and BYU was back in the top 25 following wins over Kansas and TCU. Last week was the only week since November that BYU was not in the Top 25. Following a pair of impressive wins, BYU was ranked no. 20.

BYU is one of five Big 12 teams in the AP top 25. They are joined by Houston (1), Iowa State (6), Baylor (11), and Kansas (14). BYU wins over three top 15 teams (Iowa State, Baylor, Kansas) and another win over a top 25 team (San Diego State). Earlier this year, BYU beat Iowa State convincingly at home. Those two teams will rematch on Wednesday in Ames for a top-20 battle.

It's also worth noting that San Diego State has maintained its spot in the top 25. BYU beat the Aztecs earlier this year.

There are some familiar names surrounding BYU in the latest AP poll. Former WCC goes Gonzaga (19) and Saint Mary's (23) are in the top 25. Utah State, who is 24-5 this season, is ranked no. 22.

Below is the full AP top 25.
